/** * Defines a DTD content model source. In other words, any object that * implements this interface is able to emit DTD content model "events" * to the registered DTD content model handler. These events could be * produced by parsing an XML document's internal or external subset, * could be generated from some other source, or could be created * programmatically. This interface does not say how the events * are created, only that the implementor is able to emit them. * * @author Andy Clark, IBM * * @version $Id: XMLDTDContentModelSource.java,v 1.5 2004/02/24 23:15:56 mrglavas Exp $ */
